meanings.definition: The presence of air or gas in the pleural cavity, causing collapse of the lung.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with pneumothoraxes after the chest X-ray.
meanings.sent2: The hospital treated several cases of pneumothoraxes last month.
meanings.sent3: When the balloon popped, it sounded like pneumothoraxes in the room.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the library was shattered by the sudden pneumothoraxes of laughter.
meanings.sent5: The image of the deflating balloon mirrored the concept of pneumothoraxes perfectly.
